article.title: Birmingham U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact information for the Birmingham U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
Birmingham U.S. Export Assistance Center

950 22nd Street North, Suite 773
Birmingham, Alabama 35203
http://www.export.gov/alabama
Phone: 205-731-1331
Fax: 205-731-0076
Email: Birmingham.office.box@trade.gov

Birmingham Staff

Director & Senior International Trade Specialist

Robert Stackpole
Phone: 205-731-1333
Fax: 205-731-0076
E-mail:robert.stackpole@trade.gov

Field Support Specialist

Rachel Cooper
Phone: 205-731-0190
Fax: 205-731-0076
E-mail:rachel.cooper@trade.gov

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact information for the Birmingham U.S. Export Assistance Center.
